name: FaciPayCore
summary: FaciPayCore contains the core functionality for FaciPay payments. It is not meant to be used without FaciPayUI.
description:
FaciPayCore provides the core payment functionality for FaciPay SDK including:
- SDK configuration and initialization
- Payment models (PaymentRequest, PaymentResult, etc.)
- Networking layer for API communication
- Error handling and logging
- Sentry integration for crash reporting
